com.mygdx.game.menu.store

Class Store

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.menu.store.Store

  • public class Store
extends java.lang.Object
    This class also couldn't be added to the game due to time coinstraints. This class holds the objects (skins and backgrounds) in an array, and has methods to buy them, saving the current currencies in .txt files and so on.
